thread.title: Kustom US Acquires Southern Property Restoration

author: cnbc.com
title: Kustom US Acquires Southern Property Restoration

organizations.name: kustom us acquires southern property restoration

text:
ORLANDO, Fla., March 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Kustom US ("Kustom"), one of the leading property restoration and recovery firms in North America, has acquired Southern Property Restoration ("SPR"), an Atlanta-based, locally owned and operated, full-service disaster response and restoration company with a combined 75 years of professional disaster mitigation and reconstruction experience. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
"This acquisition will help diversify our customer base and build upon our already successful presence in the greater Atlanta market by providing customers with more resources in their time of need," says Andrew Zavodney, Chairman and CEO of Kustom.
Southern Property Restoration was acquired by Kustom as part of the firm's strategic long-term expansion plan in helping accelerate growth nationwide. Southern Property Restoration currently provides turnkey disaster recovery and property restoration services to both residential and commercial clients. This acquisition will help position Kustom as one of the largest, nationally-acclaimed property restoration firms in North America.
"We have an extensive knowledge of the Atlanta market, so by joining the Kustom family, we now hold the capabilities of a more expansive impact within our community," says Craig O'Riordan, Owner of Southern Property Restoration. "The decision to be acquired by Kustom was a natural fit in that our company core values aligned perfectly."
Southern Property Restoration's leadership team, made up of Craig O'Riordan Co-Founder and Owner, as well as all staff members will remain in place.
About Kustom US
Founded in 1968 by Andrew Zavodney, Kustom US ("Kustom") ( www.kustom.us ) is a nationally acclaimed and industry-leading property restoration firm that provides unparalleled services to local, regional and national clients. Kustom specializes in providing turn-key rapid response services to ensure the uninterrupted continuation of residential and business operations following a property loss event. Over the past 50 years, Kustom has demonstrated a deep understanding of operations to consistently exceed client expectations and continues to grow into one of the most adaptive, customer-focused property restoration companies in America.
About Southern Property Restoration
Southern Property Restoration ("SPR"), now Kustom US, is an Atlanta-based, privately-owned property restoration and disaster recovery firm servicing the greater Atlanta area. SPR works with property owners and insurers to clean and repair residential and commercial properties. With a combined 75 years in professional disaster mitigation experience, SPR is one of the leading firms in the region.
